nodes.text: The Uhl Doaba'I was a rundown outbuilding at the edge of Vakeyya run by Ibhaan'I shamans. The name translated as "the peaceful place," and the shamans were all experienced guides with knowledge of the Doaba Badlands. The shamans welcomed visitors and the chance to speak with off-worlders about their adventures and the worlds beyond Socorro. Visitors who donate to the shamans would receive an osma bag, a hand-picked bag of trinkets and items selected by the shaman that would be a representation of the life-destiny path of the receiver.
